comment.body:
He will have the one or other dollar to survive this. ;-)
#FuckFacebook
I would like to have such as well. Would be nice.
@Tusiko: Sry. Just now found. ZeroHallo does it.
On my machine ZeroMe works normal for weeks now. No issues here.

@Quantumworld: Right. The independent clearnet is gone forever. Has it ever been independent?
The future are the darknets and ZeroNet in my eyes. They are not perfect but usable and on the right way. I'm waiting for ZeroNet over I2P. This will be a milestone.

@Quantumworld: If you adjust the connection speed depending your internet connection and wait one day, you will see that I2P is a little bit faster than Tor. You only have to run it 24/7 and wait one or perhaps two days. I use I2P for years now and it is stable and fast. And the most secure darknet we have at time. And the more user I2P gets, the faster it is.
